mapper.insert: insert into member values( seq_member_no.nextval, #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberLoc}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberGender}, #{memberAddr}, default, null,'member',0, #{memberLike} )
